title: The Original Timeline
key_scenes: Search for original timeline without bootstrap paradox
Contact with dying humanity in 2150 Colorado facility
Dr. Sarah Chen presents plan to create bootstrap paradox
300 survivors choose to erase themselves to save alternate humanity
Voyager destroyed by debris in 2025 in original timeline
Building quantum transmitter using last power reserves
Final transmission December 28, 2150 as everyone dies
Original timeline collapses into bootstrap timeline
Elliot returns understanding loop as gift not trap
Team realizes they exist because of ultimate sacrifice
revelations: Original timeline existed where bootstrap paradox didn't
Voyager destroyed by cosmic debris 2025 in that timeline
Humanity died slowly from climate/ecosystem collapse to 2150
300 final survivors in Colorado bunker created bootstrap signal
They chose to erase themselves to create alternate timeline
Bootstrap timeline is gift from the dead, not trap
Signal was last act of dying humanity using final power
Original timeline sacrificed itself for bootstrap timeline's existence
Everyone in bootstrap timeline owes existence to 300 people
Hope is what original timeline sent along with mathematics
planted_elements: Dr. Sarah Chen as original timeline predecessor to current Chen
Hope as essential addition to signal (payoff Ch60)
Gratitude as motivation for closing loop
Message 'We failed. Please don't' echoes through trilogy

Elliot_Cross.knowledge: Complete understanding of original timeline sacrifice
Elliot_Cross.motivation: Now driven by gratitude and honoring sacrifice, not just survival

Dr_Marcus_Soren.emotional_state: Theology transformed from determinism to gift reverence

Dr_Yuki_Chen.emotional_state: Discovers her original timeline predecessor, honored

themes_explored: Bootstrap paradox as gift from the dead
Sacrifice of entire timeline for alternate version
Existence as gratitude rather than entrapment
Free will as honoring others' choices
Hope sent across time from dying world
Determinism as sacred when chosen for others
atmosphere: Profound grief, awe, transformation, weight of sacrifice, deep emotion
foreshadowing: Elliot will add hope to signal in 1977
Closing loop becomes act of honoring sacrifice
Future iterations will know they're gifts
Loop preservation as moral imperative not just survival
temporal_mechanics_established: Original timeline existed and created bootstrap paradox deliberately
300 people erased themselves to create alternate humanity
Signal contained their hope along with knowledge
Timeline collapse can be chosen, not just failure state
next_chapter_hooks: How will this knowledge change Elliot's approach?
How do you prepare to honor such a sacrifice?
Will Reyes understand the gift nature of the loop?
What happens when team encounters Omega?
How will hope be encoded in the signal?
